page.title: 05RECREATION IN COLLIER ST.
page.content: At Collier St. fete we interviewed 37 people to find out what they enjoy doing in their spare time. The most popular activities are shown below. % TOTAL INTERVIEWEES ACTIVITY 19 Women's Institute 11 Happy Circle(Old 16 Brownies People) 3 Table Tennis Club 5 Darts 8 Whist drives 8 Bingo 8 Grass track races 57 Church activities 5 people spend one pound on activities per month, 6 spend five pounds & 16 spend over ten pounds. Most of these activities take place in the village hall except of course the racing."This goes on 6 times a year. The village is filled with motorbikes.The noise is tremendous and can be annoying".
